statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, owner_name, balance FROM financial_data;
SELECT account_number, balance, owner_name FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT id, account_number, security_code FROM financial_data WHERE security_code = 'ABC123';
SELECT owner_name, balance FROM financial_data ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY owner_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, owner_name, balance FROM financial_data WHERE account_number LIKE 'ACC%' ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT account_number, security_code FROM financial_data WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT id, account_number, balance FROM financial_data WHERE security_code IN ('123456', '789012')
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE balance < 5000 AND security_code NOT IN ('987654', '543210')
SELECT * FROM financial_accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM financial_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000.00;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM financial_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM financial_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM financial_accounts WHERE account_owner_id = 123;
SELECT account_name, account_balance, u.username FROM financial_accounts fa JOIN users u ON fa.account_owner_id = u.user_id WHERE u.email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN financial_accounts ON users.user_id = financial_accounts.account_owner_id;
SELECT u.username, fa.account_name, fa.account_balance FROM users u JOIN financial_accounts fa ON u.user_id = fa.account_owner_id ORDER BY fa.account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.balance FROM Users u JOIN Accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.username = 'Alice';
SELECT t.transaction_id, a.balance, t.amount FROM Transactions t JOIN Accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount < 0 ORDER BY a.balance ASC, t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT a.account_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM accounts a JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id WHERE t.amount < 0 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance, account_type FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.balance FROM transactions t INNER JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount < 0;
